channel.title: All the clients i download i get this error
channel.description:
http://xs841.xs.to/xs841/09315/5669.jpg
help me please i need to fix this i have jdk6 v 14

item.title: All the clients i download i get this error
item.dc:creator: @storm_breaker storm_breaker
item.description:
@storm_breaker wrote:

lol easy fix just set your environmental variables i’ll post a guideline for vista on adding this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2009, 03:57:41 pm[/size][hr]well heres a guide line for vista go to start right click computer and click properties. then on there somewhere you should see Computer name: Owner to the side of it you should see something called change settings. now you should see system properties from there go in the advanced tab, and click on environmental variables. in there you will see system variables.
look for classpath and once you find it edit it and put where you jdk version is located this is an example of my classpath…

Quote:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

replace jdk1.6.0_14 with your current jdk version.

after that go down to path and add

Quote:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;

to the end of it but change jdk1.6.0_14 to your current jdk version. apply changes and try to re run your client. if you still get the error then you added your environmental variables wrong.
